text: Amanda Seyfried Net Worth : Amanda Seyfried is an American actress, singer and former model who has a net worth of $ 10 million. Amanda Seyfried was born December 3, 1985 in Allentown, Pennsylvania. Seyfried began her public career as a child model ( ages 11 to 15 ) then broke into acting by means of soap operas ( As the World Turns and All My Children ). She then landed a supporting role in HBO's Big Love and was then cast in the film Mean Girls. Her first major lead film role was in Mamma Mia!, co - starring Meryl Streep and Pierce Brosnan.
